thread.title: Miley Cyrus Going on Tour With The Flaming Lips Later This Year
thread.title_full: Miley Cyrus Going on Tour With The Flaming Lips Later This Year

author: AceShowbiz.com
title: Miley Cyrus Going on Tour With The Flaming Lips Later This Year
text:
Comments The singer and her 'Miley Cyrus and Her Dead Petz' collaborators are going on a tour to support the album. 
Miley Cyrus is embarking on a tour with The Flaming Lips later this year. The Disney darling announced the news while promoting her upcoming " Saturday Night Live " appearance on " The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon " on Thursday night, October 1. "I'm going to go on tour later this year, me and the Lips," Cyrus told host Jimmy Fallon , who then called the group "badass." The tour is launched to support Cyrus and the band's recently-released joint effort " Miley Cyrus and Her Dead Petz ". Details about the trek including dates and venues, however, aren't currently available. "Miley Cyrus and Her Dead Petz" was released as a free album after Cyrus hosted the 2015 MTV Video Music Awards in late August. During the chat with Fallon, the 22-year-old singer said she would sell the album's vinyl editions on tour. Cyrus will guest host and perform on "SNL" when the show kicks off its 41st season this weekend, October 3.
